graphql.query:
mutation {
    addAccount(account: {
        accountId: "A100",
        accountType: CHECKING,
        accountNumber: "123456789",
        accountNumberDisplay: "1234-567-89",
        nickName: "Emergency Fund",
        status: OPEN,
        description: "High-yield savings account for emergency funds.",
        lineOfBusiness: "Retail Banking",
        routingTransitNumber: "111000025",
        interestRate: 1.5,
        interestRateType: FIXED,
        interestRateAsOf: "2024-01-19T16:39:57-08:00",
        currency: "USD",
        lastActivityDate: "2024-01-19T16:39:57-08:00",
        balanceAsOf: "2024-01-19T16:39:57-08:00",
        currentBalance: 3445,
        openingDayBalance: 4444,
        availableBalance: 79872,
        annualPercentageYield: 1.54,
        interestYtd: 5,
        term: null,
        maturityDate: null
    })
}

query{
    getAllAccounts {
      accountId
      accountType
      accountNumber
      accountNumberDisplay
      nickName
      status
      description
      lineOfBusiness
      routingTransitNumber
      interestRate
      interestRateType
      interestRateAsOf
      currency
      lastActivityDate
      balanceAsOf
      currentBalance
      openingDayBalance
      availableBalance
      annualPercentageYield
      interestYtd
      term
      maturityDate
  }
}

mutation {
  editAccount(account: {
    accountId: "1",
    accountType: CHECKING,
    accountNumber: "123456789",
    accountNumberDisplay: "1234-567-89",
    nickName: "Emergency Fund",
    status: OPEN,
    description: "High-yield savings account for emergency funds.",
    lineOfBusiness: "Wholesale Banking",
    routingTransitNumber: "111000025",
    interestRate: 1.5,
    interestRateType: FIXED,
    interestRateAsOf: "2024-01-19T16:39:57-08:00",
    currency: "INR",
    lastActivityDate: "2024-01-19T16:39:57-08:00",
    balanceAsOf: "2024-01-19T16:39:57-08:00",
    currentBalance: 5000,
    openingDayBalance: 5000,
    availableBalance: 5000,
    annualPercentageYield: 1.5,
    interestYtd: 10,
    term: 2,
    maturityDate: "2024-01-19T16:39:57-08:00"
  }){
    accountId
    currency
    currentBalance
  }
}

graphql.query:
query {
  getAccountById(accountID:"A100") {
    accountId
    accountType
    accountNumber
    accountNumberDisplay
    nickName
    status
    description
    lineOfBusiness
    routingTransitNumber
    interestRate
    interestRateType
    interestRateAsOf
    currency
    lastActivityDate
    balanceAsOf
    currentBalance
    openingDayBalance
    availableBalance
    annualPercentageYield
    interestYtd
    term
    maturityDate
  }
}

query AccountsByIdQuery ($accountIdVar: ID!) {
  getAccountById(accountID:   $accountIdVar) {
    accountId
    accountType
    accountNumber
    accountNumberDisplay
    nickName
    status
    description
    lineOfBusiness
    routingTransitNumber
    interestRate
    interestRateType
    interestRateAsOf
    currency
    lastActivityDate
    balanceAsOf
    currentBalance
    openingDayBalance
    availableBalance
    annualPercentageYield
    interestYtd
    term
    maturityDate
  }
}

{
  getTransactionById(accountId:"A100"){
      transactionId
      description
      account {
      accountId
      accountType
      accountNumber
      accountNumberDisplay
      nickName
      status
      description
      lineOfBusiness
      routingTransitNumber
      interestRate
      interestRateType
      interestRateAsOf
      currency
      lastActivityDate
      
      ... on DepositAccount {
        balanceAsOf
        currentBalance
        openingDayBalance
        availableBalance
        annualPercentageYield
        interestYtd
        term
        maturityDate
      }
    }
      status
    }
}

query GetTransactionByAccountId ($accountIdVar: ID!){
  getTransactionById(accountId:$accountIdVar){
      transactionId
      description
      account {
      accountId
      accountType
      accountNumber
      accountNumberDisplay
      nickName
      status
      description
      lineOfBusiness
      routingTransitNumber
      interestRate
      interestRateType
      interestRateAsOf
      currency
      lastActivityDate
      
      ... on DepositAccount {
        balanceAsOf
        currentBalance
        openingDayBalance
        availableBalance
        annualPercentageYield
        interestYtd
        term
        maturityDate
      }
    }
      status
    }
}
